name: Integrity Technology Specialists
overview:
You don’t have to be mentally ill to do something good for society.

Integrity Technology Specialists were opened in 2006 by a disabled man with multiple IT certifications. After spending much time with little success, our path to achieve success changed. Initially focused on computer repair and small business IT support, we found that the anxiety caused by dealing with people was overwhelming.

A new dream was born. Considering our limitation dealing with people, we refocused our services into the design of static html websites. After continued failure at attaining paying clients a decision was made. That decision was “if they won’t pay me to do it I will do it for free”. The hopes was that by offering volunteer services we would turn paying clients as well.

Much failure at volunteering, it took a long time to build a strong volunteer portfolio.

Now in our fifther year, we have still lost money and we are still volunteering. On occassion we recieve a paying client.

We defined ourselves as “Integrity Technology Specialists” when we opened our doors in 2006. Integrity Technology Specialists is a good way to hide from society that the company is owned by a man with severe mental illness.

Integrity Technology Specialists is now Web Design by MikeStratton.net. Mike Stratton has mental illness and is disabled.

Mike Stratton to date has volunteered over 1,200 hours of web design work for non profits. Yes Mike Stratton is mentally ill, but it is better to dream of being a success in business and volunteer then to throw in the towel and accept his own insanity as being completely disabling.

Mike Stratton is Integrity Technology Specialists, and Integrity Technology Specialists is doing business as Web Design by MikeStratton.net. Web Design by MikeStratton.net is a mentally ill volunteer web designer.

You don’t have to be mentally ill to do something good for society.
